casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Johnny Lee REED. No. 341P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of July 2005 by Defendant for Writ of Coram Nobis:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
